unnormalised: Boro, petrolache bhav, kiteak? Soglle zann te vixim uloitat, khas korun Mumbai-che auto-rickshaw bhadyapexa te vegim bodoltat oxem dista tedna. Tem soglle litre, kilometer, ani tea bhirantichea Rs. chinna vixim asa. Tumchea baikik bhortat, mileage check kortat, ani magir santponnan prarthana kortat ki tumi dusrea khepek petrol pumpak vetana, rate ratot-rat ₹2-an vaddleli nasum.
normalised: Boru, petrolachem mol, bara? Soglle tacher uloitat, khas korun Mumbain auto-rickshaw fare poros te vegim bodlotat mhunn dista. Tem soglle litres, kilometers, ani tea bhayanak rupee symbol vixim asa. Tumchi bike bhorta, mileage check korta, ani magir chup ravun prarthana korta ki dusrea velar tum petrol pumpak vetana, ratchea ratak don rupee-n rate vaddo naslo.

unnormalised: Mhaka ugddas asa tedna petrol litreak Rs. 50 astalem, oxem dharun ghe. Atam, tumi ₹100 prati L-ache lagimchea price tag-ak polletat, tumi kitem asat tacher adharun. Delhi Chennai-pexa thoddi unni asunk xakta, ani kaim rajyamni te ekxtra taxes astat je tumchea poixeachea peti thode adhik rudan kortat. Tem tumkam ek electric scooter-ak bodlopak vichar korunk purnn zata, punn magir tumkam charging time, scooter-achi survatichi kim'mat, ani eka charging-acher tumi ghara portun ieunk xaktat kai hacho sodanch asun axil'lo range anxiety ugddas aita. Ti battery capacity samanyponnan kWh-an mezpi astat. Udahoronnak, chodd porvodkai electric scooter-anchi capacity lagbhag 2.5 kWh asta.
normalised: Mhaka ugddas asa jevhna petrol ek litreak pon'nas rupee astale. Atam, tum ek rupee ek shamber litreak lagim aslolea price tagacher polaita, tum kitem asa tacher adharun. Delhi Chennaiporos thoddi cheap asta, ani thoddea states-anim te extra taxes astat je tumchem wallet thodem chodd dukheta. Tem tuka electric scooter-ak bodolchek chintunk puro asa, punn magir tum charging time ugddas korta, scooter-achi survatichi kimat, ani tum eka charge-acher porot ghara ieunk xakta vo na mhunn lagpi range anxiety. Ti battery capacity sadharanponnan kilowatt hours-anim mezpachi asta. Udharonnachak, chodd affordable e-scooters-anchi capacity don point panch kilowatt hours asa.

unnormalised: Magir soglli fuel efficiency-chi vost asta. Mhojea kakannan soogon ghetla ki tachea purnnea Maruti-n taka highway-cher 25 kmpl (kilometer prati litre) dita. Mhaka dista to vaddoita mhunn. Mhoji car xarant kel'lean 15 km/l-ach kel'lean vevostha kortat, stop-start traffic ani soglle. Ani sales guy-an mhaka mhaka 20 dilem mhunn sonpurnn vachan dil'lem! Tem tedna asli zatlem zata tedna to donga uprant vatache fatlean choltale. Plus, fuel tank capacity - lagbhag 40-45 liters - tem eka kuttumbachea melovnnant biryani plate-apexa vegim rigta oxem dista.
normalised: Magir tea sogllea fuel efficiency-achi vostu asa. Mhozo mama, to soput gheun sangta ki tachea junnea Maruti-n taka highway-cher ponchis kilometers ek litreak dita. Mhaka dista to vaddoita mhunn. Mhaji car xeharant pondhra kilometers ek litreak chodd manage korina, stop-start traffic ani soglle. Ani sales gayan jevhna hanv tem viktem ghetlem tevha mhaka ponchis sanglo! Tem zait taka dhongrar sokal poddona vatten varea fattim astana. Plus, fuel tank-achi capacity - sadharanponnan challis te ponchallis litres - ti family gathering-ant biryani plate poros vegim rikta zata mhunn dista.

unnormalised: Ani CNG-acher survat korunk dinak. Prati kg bhavor bodlot ravtat. Tem unnem asa? Chodd korun, hanv. Punn tumkam tumchi car bodlunk lagpachi kim'mat, CNG station-acher rokhddechi voll (ji kaim velar tumi visa khatir line-ant ube asat oxem bhogta), ani tumkam tea ekxtra tank-ak gheun vochunk poddta ten'nni vichar korunk poddta. Ek CNG cylinder samanyponnan 12 kg-che 14 kg-chea gazak dhorun dovorta.
normalised: Ani C-N-G vixim uloiyena. Kilogram-achem mol bodlot rauta. Tem cheap asa? Chodd korun, hoich. Punn tumchea car-ak convert korchea kharcheak factor korcho poddta, C-N-G station-acher ravchea vellak (zaka tum visa khatir line-ant ubo asa mhunn dispak xakta), ani tumchea sangata to extra tank ukhlun vhorcho poddta tea fact-ak. Ek C-N-G cylinder sadharanponnan bara kilograms te chaudda kilograms gas dharta.

unnormalised: Hanv ek article vachun astalem jen'nan ullekh kel'lo ki Bharatant eka novea torechea fuel-achi parkhonni kortat. Tem lagbhag 10% poriant fuel efficiency sudhorta, ~ 2-3 kmpl-an vaddon kel'lean.
normalised: Hanv eka article-ak vachitalo zachent sangllem ki ek novem prakarachem fuel Bharotant test kortat mhunn. Tem fuel efficiency sumar dha percent-an vaddoita mhunn sangtat je sumar don te tin kilometers ek litreak vaddoita.

unnormalised: Gambhirponnan, tumchi car soddun dila ani fakt xarachi train gheunk tumkam puro zata. Punn magir tumkam peak hour-acho crush ani ekdam kuxik vochunk kitli xokti zai ti ugddas aita. Mhunn, tumi petrol pumpak portun ietat, tumchem card swiping kortat, ani konnain tori hea fuel price-chea divyavellar khorem utor sodun kaddlea kain mhunn vicharun. Uchit asa kiteak tori ami soglle tem bhavy, hydrogen-acher cholpi cars choltole, kiteak tori ek ekdam exotic, unnem fuel bhorun, ani tednache disanchea vixim hastele jen'nami Rs. prati litre-anchea petrolachea bhavachi chinta kortale. Punn tedna poriant, to fuel price rollercoaster-acher ek dusri ride-ach asa, buckle up korunk ani tumchea sogllea dhondhechea vostunk to fuel unnem asta tedna poilim ghoddoun haddtat.
normalised: Seriously, tem tuka car-ak soddun dilem ani local train-an vochk chintunk puro asa. Punn magir tum peak hour-icho crush ugddas korta ani carriage-acher tuka dhukolpak kitli force zai ti ugddas korta. Mhunnun, tum petrol pumpak porot ieita, tumchem card swipe korta, ani konnakan tori sangto ki konnaka fuel price-achi hi vegleach prakarachi bhovall sodounk mellchea vixim. Kiteak tori falea ami soglle futuristic hydrogen-powered cars choloitole, exotic, cheap fuel bhorun, ani ami jevhna petrol-achem mol rupee-n litre-ak chintalem tevha hastele. Punn tevha meren, tem fuel price rollercoaster-acher ek anik ride asa, buckle up kara ani tumchim sogllim errands prepone kara jevhna fuel cheap asta.
